title: Hotel / restaurant industry : percentage of female employees by region 2010
summary: The u.s. , followed by switzerland , had the highest average cost per day to stay in a hospital as of 2015 . At that time the hospital costs per day in the u.s. were on average 5220 u.s. dollars . In comparison , the hospital costs per day in spain stood at an average of 424 u.s. dollars .
gold: This graph shows the percentage of female employees in the hotel and restaurant industry in 2010 . Latin America has 58.5 percent female employees .
